casebody.data:
JONES
v.
CITY OF DURHAM. No. 137A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 24, 2006. Stewart W. Fisher, Carlos E. Mahoney, William S. Mills, Durham, for Linda Jones. Mark A. Davis, Raleigh, for County Commissioners, et al. Bradley N. Schulz, T. Marie Mobley, Smithfield, for Academy of Trial Lawyers.

The following order has been entered on the corrected motion filed on the 21st day of April 2006 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (City of Durham, et al.) shall have up to and including the 12th day of May 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 24th day of April 2006."
